entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Snow level lowering to 2100 metres this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 in wind prone areas. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 in wind prone areas this evening. Wind becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
